title: A Smith's Request
description: The blacksmith needs you to gather materials for a special weapon order.
questText: I've got a special order for a weapon, but I'm running low on iron ore. Could you gather 3 pieces of iron ore for me? You can find them in the forest or mines. I'll reward you well for your help!
completionText: Excellent! This iron ore is perfect quality. Here's your reward - take this sword I crafted specially for you!
